title: Advance Purchase Rate
short_desc: Reward yourself with extra savings when you book in advance. Now that summer is here, enjoy an additional $20.00 Starbucks card with your direct booking.
long_desc:
Experience New York City's elite neighborhood of TriBeCa without paying elite prices. At The Cosmopolitan Hotel TriBeCa, we create the most enviable NYC hotel deals around, but our advance purchase rate is really worth writing home about.

We design our NYC hotel specials to provide our guests with the best possible experience. Simply book your stay with us 14 days in advance to enjoy 20% off the best available rate as well as complimentary Wi-Fi for the duration of your stay. 

Book in Advance and Enjoy:

  • Stay at least 3 nights and save up to 30% off the best available rate
  • Complimentary Wi-Fi

Terms and Conditions:

  • Valid until December 31, 2017
  • Three-night minimum stay
  • Reservation requires pre-payment and is non-refundable, non-transferrable and non-cancellable
  • Reservation will be charged for full amount to credit card at time of confirmation
  • Changes, cancellation or no-show will forfeit the full prepaid deposit amount

If you can't book in advance, take advantage of our other New York City hotel deals.

Starbucks card terms & conditions

  • One card per room/per stay
  • Book for stays now through September 4, 2017
  • Applies to bookings made through our website only

meta_content: Each of our NYC hotel deals are enviable and this is no exception. Book in advance to secure 20% off our best available rate and complimentary Wi-Fi.
